zouk_zero_to_hero_description: We organize Brazilian Zouk classes and socials in Helsinki

welcome.welcome_title: Would you like to learn to dance Brazilian Zouk?
welcome.welcome_description: In the summer, we have outdoor classes every Wednesday evening, weather permitting. Come try it out! No previous dance experience or partner of your own needed. You can check the details in the Facebook event.

links.zerotohero_page: Zouk Zero to Hero Facebook page
links.lambada_extra_info: Zouk evolved from Lambada, and many people also dance Lambada in Zouk socials
